title: Episode 122: The Ms. Pat Show Debuts on Thursday!
description:
It is finally here! The Ms. Pat Show debuts on BET Plus this Thursday. Her writer Jordan Cooper discusses the making of the show and how often he'd write in jokes to mess with the cast. 

Start your free trial for BET Plus here: https://www.bet.plus/
Learn more about your ad choices. Visit megaphone.fm/adchoices
